Can hold up to 500 lbs while weighing only 15,if the bag is overloaded, pierced, or torn, it ruptures and is destroyed, and its contents are scattered

This small sphere of  glass 1 pound. If you are within 60 feet of it, light or daylight spell. The daylight effect can't be used again until the next dawn. The globe can rise into the air and float 5 feet off the ground. it follows 60 feet of you. If prevented from moving it falls and turns off
